subject: Personal Finance
title: Student Loan Debt
description: A short lesson to help you apply Student Loan Debt.

hook.text: US student loan debt hit $1.7 trillion in 2023. It's now larger than all credit card debt combined.

buildup.text: Student loans fund education under the theory that higher earnings will cover the cost.

discovery.text: A college degree does increase lifetime earnings on average by about $1 million.

twist.text: But averages hide enormous variation. English majors and engineering majors have very different ROIs.

climax.text: Student debt uniquely can't be discharged in bankruptcy. The debt follows you for life.

punchline.text: Education debt is the only kind you can't escape.

quiz.question: What makes US student loans unique among debts?
options: They generally can't be discharged in bankruptcy
